text: Huh? While attending a New York Fashion Week event on Friday, September 8, Jim Carrey gave a very strange interview. The 55 - year - old actor began by circling around E! News host Catt Sadler at Harper ’ s Bazaar ’ s party celebrating Icons by Carine Roitfeld at the Plaza in New York City, and it only got more awkward from there. See the Stars at New York Fashion Week 2017 “ There ’ s no meaning to any of this, ” Carrey explained of his attendance at the star - studded event. “ So I wanted to find the most meaningless thing that I could come to and join and here I am. You got to admit, it ’ s completely meaningless. ” When Sadler added that the party was celebrating icons, Carrey replied, “
